requirement_tested: User registration functionality with form validation
user_persona: A first-time visitor named Priya who wants to join the matrimonial site to find a life partner.
user_goal: Successfully register for a new account by filling out the registration form with valid information.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Registration Form
narrative_steps.description: Priya visits the homepage and sees a prominent 'Register' button. She clicks it to begin her journey.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The registration form appears with fields for email, password, and confirm password, styled with lemon chiffon background and chocolate content blocks.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Valid Details
narrative_steps.description: Priya fills in her email address, creates a strong password, and confirms it. As she types, real-time validation gives feedback.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in email, password, and confirm password fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline validation messages appear confirming correct formats and matching passwords. The 'Register' button becomes enabled.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Registration
narrative_steps.description: Confident that all fields are filled correctly, Priya clicks the 'Register' button to submit her details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Client-side validation passes, and a POST request is sent to /api/register. Upon success, Priya receives a confirmation message and is redirected to the login page.

user_persona: Raj, a returning user who has already registered and now wants to access his account.
user_goal: Log into his existing account using his email and password.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Login Page
narrative_steps.description: Raj opens the website and notices the 'Login' button prominently displayed on the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A centralized login form appears with email and password fields, styled with lemon chiffon background and chocolate-styled inputs.

narrative_steps.title: Providing Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Raj enters his registered email and password. While typing, he gets immediate feedback on the validity of the email format.
narrative_steps.action: Enter email and password into respective fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Email validation displays no errors, and the 'Login' button becomes active.

narrative_steps.title: Authenticating Account
narrative_steps.description: Raj clicks the 'Login' button to proceed with accessing his account.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Credentials are submitted via POST to /api/login. On successful authentication, Raj is redirected to the dashboard with a welcome message.

requirement_tested: Profile creation interface allowing users to upload photos
user_persona: Meera, a newly registered user eager to set up her profile and share some personal information.
user_goal: Complete her profile setup by adding personal information and uploading profile pictures.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Profile Creation
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Meera is prompted to complete her profile. She begins by entering basic information like name, age, and gender.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out basic info section of the multi-step form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each field accepts input, and navigation to next steps is available.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Photos
narrative_steps.description: Meera clicks 'Add Photo' to upload her pictures. She selects a photo from her device and uses the cropping tool to adjust it.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Add Photo', select an image file, and use the crop tool.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Image preview appears with cropping controls. Cropped image is ready for upload.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Profile
narrative_steps.description: Once satisfied with her entries and uploaded photo, Meera clicks 'Save Profile' to finalize her profile creation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All data is sent to the backend via POST to /api/upload/photo and /api/profile/create. Success message confirms profile completion.

requirement_tested: Profile editing capability for personal information management
user_persona: Suresh, a regular user who wants to update his profile after moving to a new city.
user_goal: Update his location and add more details to his bio.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Edit Profile
narrative_steps.description: Suresh logs in and navigates to his profile where he finds the 'Edit Profile' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: His current profile information populates a pre-filled form similar to the creation interface.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Information
narrative_steps.description: He updates his location and adds more context to his bio, noticing the live character count updating.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Character counter reflects real-time changes in the bio length. Updated values remain intact.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Changes
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the edits, Suresh saves the updated information.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: PUT request is made to /api/profile/update. Profile is refreshed with new information, and a success notification is shown.

requirement_tested: Advanced search functionality with multiple filter criteria
user_persona: Neha, looking for compatible partners based on specific preferences such as profession and age range.
user_goal: Find suitable matches by applying several filters simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Search Panel
narrative_steps.description: Neha navigates to the search page and opens the filter panel to start refining her search.
narrative_steps.action: Open the filter sidebar or panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Filter options like sliders for age, dropdowns for profession, and checkboxes for hobbies become visible.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: She sets an age range, chooses a preferred profession, and checks off relevant hobbies.
narrative_steps.action: Adjust age slider, select profession, and check hobby boxes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected filters highlight visually and are ready to apply.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Filtered Results
narrative_steps.description: Neha clicks 'Apply Filters' to see the refined list of potential partners.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: POST request is sent to /api/search/partners with filter criteria. Matched profiles are displayed in a grid below.

requirement_tested: Partner matching algorithm based on user preferences
user_persona: Arjun, curious about seeing how well others match his stated preferences.
user_goal: Discover personalized partner recommendations generated by the system.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Recommendations Section
narrative_steps.description: Arjun goes to the 'Matches' tab on his dashboard to explore suggested partners.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A carousel or grid of recommended profiles shows up, each indicating a compatibility percentage.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Recommendations
narrative_steps.description: Arjun likes one profile and dislikes another to influence future suggestions.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Like' on one profile and 'Dislike' on another.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Liked profile increases in relevance; disliked profile disappears from view and affects recommendation logic.

user_persona: Kavita, interested in starting a conversation with someone she recently matched with.
user_goal: Initiate and send a private message to another user.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Contact
narrative_steps.description: Kavita accesses her inbox and selects a contact from her conversations list.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a contact in the conversation sidebar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message thread associated with that contact loads in the main panel.

narrative_steps.title: Composing Message
narrative_steps.description: She composes a friendly greeting in the message box and presses enter to send.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message is posted to /api/messages/send. Sent message appears instantly in the chat window.

requirement_tested: Real-time chat functionality between matched users
user_persona: Dev, engaged in a real-time conversation with a match.
user_goal: Exchange messages instantly with another user using the real-time chat feature.

narrative_steps.title: Engaging in Live Chat
narrative_steps.description: While chatting, Dev notices a typing indicator when the other person starts writing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: 'Is typing...' status is displayed under the recipient's name.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Emoji
narrative_steps.description: Wanting to express emotion, Dev clicks the emoji icon and selects a smiley face.
narrative_steps.action: Click emoji icon and choose an emoji.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Emoji picker modal opens; selected emoji inserts into the message box.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Instant Message
narrative_steps.description: Dev hits send to deliver the emoji-laden message immediately.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message is emitted over WebSocket and received by the other party almost instantly.

requirement_tested: User dashboard displaying profile and match recommendations
user_persona: Pooja, checking her daily activity and exploring new matches from the dashboard.
user_goal: Review her profile summary, recent matches, and unread messages quickly from the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Upon logging in, Pooja lands directly on her dashboard which summarizes her account activity.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Widgets show profile completion progress, top match recommendations, and unread messages count.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Widgets
narrative_steps.description: Pooja clicks on the 'Recent Matches' widget to see more potential partners.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the Recent Matches widget.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the full matches page with expanded recommendations.

requirement_tested: Photo gallery display for user profiles
user_persona: Anil, wanting to review and showcase all his uploaded profile photos.
user_goal: Browse through his uploaded photos in a clean gallery layout.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Gallery Thumbnails
narrative_steps.description: Anil scrolls down to the photo section of his profile and sees a horizontal row of thumbnails.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the photo gallery section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Thumbnails of his uploaded photos appear in a neatly arranged row, styled with chocolate borders.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Individual Photo
narrative_steps.description: Curious about one picture, Anil clicks on a thumbnail to get a better look.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Lightbox modal opens showing the enlarged version with navigation arrows and a close control.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design optimized for desktop and mobile
user_persona: Rita, browsing the site from her smartphone while commuting.
user_goal: Have a seamless experience regardless of screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Using Mobile View
narrative_steps.description: Rita accesses the site on her phone and notices the layout adapts to fit her smaller screen.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the site on a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts dynamically with responsive columns, larger fonts, and a hamburger menu for navigation.

narrative_steps.title: Toggling Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: To navigate easily, Rita taps the hamburger menu icon to reveal hidden options.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation menu slides open revealing additional links and sections.

requirement_tested: Frontend application fetching all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A developer verifying dynamic content rendering on the frontend.
user_goal: Ensure that all displayed data comes from backend API calls instead of hardcoded values.

narrative_steps.title: Initial Data Load
narrative_steps.description: When visiting any data-dependent page, the frontend shows temporary spinners before content renders.
narrative_steps.action: Load a page requiring backend data (e.g., dashboard).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Loading indicators appear initially, then disappear once Axios/Fetch retrieves and populates the DOM with actual data.

requirement_tested: Backend API connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A backend engineer validating database connectivity.
user_goal: Confirm that the backend service connects securely to the PostgreSQL database using environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Connection Config
narrative_steps.description: The engineer reviews the backend configuration files to ensure they reference the correct environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect backend config files for database connection parameters.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Configuration references DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, and DB_NAME from .env without exposing secrets.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json configured with install:all and dev scripts
user_persona: A contributor setting up the project locally for development.
user_goal: Install dependencies and run both frontend and backend servers concurrently using predefined scripts.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: The contributor runs the installation script to prepare the local environment.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend node_modules are installed concurrently without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Running Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: With everything installed, the contributor starts both development servers together.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend servers launch concurrently, listening on their respective ports.

requirement_tested: UI design implementing lemon chiffon background with chocolate content blocks
user_persona: A designer reviewing the implemented UI theme consistency.
user_goal: Verify that the entire UI follows the prescribed lemon chiffon and chocolate color scheme.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Overall Theme
narrative_steps.description: The designer inspects various pages to confirm consistent usage of colors.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate through different sections of the app.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All backgrounds use #FFFACD (lemon chiffon), and content blocks consistently utilize #D2691E (chocolate) styling.
